articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Catfish Farm
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					 He looked round the monument to the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's field guidance to the farm and learned in detail about how the farm has carried out his behests.
					
					 The farm is a patriotic legacy left by the Generalissimo as he chose a good site for it and named it "Pyongyang Catfish Farm" when its construction was completed, he said.
					
					  He recalled that Kim Jong Il went round production processes for hours and gave precious instructions for developing the pisciculture in a Korean way during his visit to the farm in September 2009, saying that the farm is a major base of supply service for Pyongyangites.
					
					 Our country has solid foundations for pisciculture built thanks to the energetic leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said, stressing that in order to make fish-breeding bases, built with much effort, pay off substantially, it is important to accept the Party's policy of developing the pisciculture with heart and push forward this work perseveringly.
					
					 The Pyongyang Catfish Farm should actively contribute to making the hot wind of pisciculture prevail in the country by bringing about a great innovation in fish farming, he said, adding: Then it can be a people's favorite farm as desired by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 And he said that a mosaic depicting smiling Kim Jong Il should be erected in the compound of the farm to convey the undying exploits he performed to make a new history of catfish farming in the country. 
					
					 Then, he went round the combined production control room, spawning ground and indoor and outdoor ponds of the farm to learn about its production and advanced tasks to be carried out by the farm. 
					
					 He referred in detail to the problems arising in production and management such as matters of giving play to the mental power of employees and improving their living conditions, perfectly establishing the integrated production system, building up the scientific and technical forces, intensifying the technical study among employees, exchanging among different units the good experience gained in pisciculture and enhancing the role of scientific research field.
					
					 It is the Party's will to turn the Pyongyang Catfish Farm into a model and standard farm for the pisciculture field of the country, he said, adding he would dispatch competent designing and construction forces for its modernization. 
					
					 Saying that the Party's expectation for the farm is very great, he expressed belief that its officials and employees would lead the country in catfish farming. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Choe Ryong Hae, Department Director An Jong Su and First Vice Department Director Ri Jae Il of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: KSDP Spokesman Raps S. Korean Puppet Group's Forcible Disbanding of UPP
articles.content:
KSDP Spokesman Raps S. Korean Puppet Group's Forcible Disbanding of UPP
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) released a statement on Tuesday denouncing the south Korean puppet group for disbanding the Unified Progressive Party (UPP).
					 Terming the puppet group's action thrice-cursed politically-motivated terrorism against democracy and human rights, an unprecedented heinous act of stamping out the progressive, democratic, reform-minded forces making efforts to bring new politics and life and achieve independent reunification, the statement went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the puppet conservative group is deliberately linking the programme and activities of the UPP to the DPRK in a foolish bid to escape the strong public protest and denunciation of it.
					
					 Whenever they faced a ruling crisis, the past conservative ruling forces created a terror-ridden atmosphere in the south Korean society by suppressing and killing those of the political parties and personages who struggled for independence, democracy, reunification and patriotism after labeling them "spies of the north."
					
					 This was a trite method employed by them.
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea, daughter of the "yusin" dictator, is following in the footsteps of her father and putting the preceding dictators into the shade in barbarity, viciousness and baseness.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that the fascist repressive racket kicked off by her with the UPP's case as a prelude will suppress other political parties and organizations at the point of bayonets of fascist dictators by branding them as "followers of the north" in the future.
					
					 As long as such a fascist group as the present south Korean ruling forces is allowed to go scot-free, there will be no independence, democracy, freedom and human rights in the south Korean society but it will only bring confrontation and war disaster to Koreans.
					
					 The Korean Social Democratic Party, together with other progressive parties in the world setting store by justice and truth, will never pardon thrice-cursed fascist terrorism of the Park Geun Hye group which forcibly disbanded the UPP. 
					
					 All Koreans will sternly punish the conservative group seeking to prolong its remaining days by enforcing "yusin" dictatorship against the trend of times and public mindset.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They were conveyed to Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Zhang Ping, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Tuesday.

articles.title: Russian Govt. Offers Food Aid to DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Govt. Offers Food Aid to DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Russian government's free food aid of 50 000 tons to the DPRK was wound up with due ceremony at Nampho Port on Tuesday.
					 The food aid will contribute to developing the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Performed for Developing Korean Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Performed for Developing Korean Revolutionary Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- December 24 is the significant day marking the 97th anniversary of birth of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On this day the Korean army and people are looking back with deep emotion upon the shining exploits Kim Jong Suk performed in the sacred history of Songun revolution.
					
					 She visited at least 320 units of the Korean People's Army till the last moments of her life after the liberation of the country, devoting herself to the work for developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 She paid deep attention to developing the Pyongyang Institute, the first military educational institution after liberation, into a pedigree establishment for training military and political workers boundlessly faithful to President Kim Il Sung in name and reality.
					
					 Learning about the work at the institute on Dec. 30, Juche 34 (1945), Kim Jong Suk stressed the need to display the portrait of Kim Il Sung at the venue of the inaugural ceremony of the institute and the slogan "Long live General Kim Il Sung, the sagacious leader of our nation!" with due respect.
					
					 She visited the institute, accompanying Kim Il Sung on the day of its opening, and told officials to orientate military education to holding  fast to the revolutionary idea of the party and thoroughly embodying it under any circumstances.
					
					 When the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" was created, she let cadets of the institute sing the song in grand chorus before any others, thus enshrining the image of the President as the sun in their minds.
					
					 She made sure that a statue of Kim Il Sung was erected at the Central Security Officers School and the commemorative medal for the graduates was significantly made.
					
					 Every thing ranging from glorious colors to uniforms, haversack, weapons, combat training and supply service is associated with her wisdom and efforts.
					
					 Her noble revolutionary life and exploits which will always remain shining along with the history of the founding of the Juche-oriented army powerfully inspire the army and people of the DPRK bringing about a new historical turning point in the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Papers Rap U.S. "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Rap U.S. "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here Tuesday in commentaries denounce the U.S. for persistently kicking up a racket against the DPRK over the "human rights issue."
					 Some days ago the U.S. assistant secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights and Labor and a special envoy for Human Rights and Humanitarian Issues brought together human scum who committed unpardonable crimes before the country and its people and fled to south Korea after abandoning their native places and their families and let loose sheer sophism before them that the "north has the worst human rights record."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun observes in a commentary that the U.S. ulterior intention is to brand the DPRK as a "human rights abuser" at any cost in a bid to justify its reckless moves against the DPRK and realize its sinister aim but such ploy can never work in the present world.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is always steeped in such inveterate and morbid repugnancy toward the DPRK that it is behaving like a mentally deranged person, unaware of where it stands and lacking a proper understanding of the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 It has neither justification nor qualifications to say about the human rights in other countries as it has perpetrated the most horrible human rights abuses in the world.
					
					 The U.S. is kicking up the frantic "human rights" campaign against the DPRK even with "defectors from the north" involved. In other words, it is keen to bring down the social system in the DPRK by using "human rights" as a weapon as it could not achieve the aim through a nuclear racket. This is, however, nothing but a daydream.
					
					 Minju Joson warns that the U.S. should learn a universally accepted ethics of the human world calling for looking into its faults before blaming others and it is the only remedy for the U.S. to get cured of mental derangement.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Its Rigmarole about Human Rights Issue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Its Rigmarole about Human Rights Issue 
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are talking rubbish about the DPRK's "human rights" issue. This is as an impertinent an act as a beggar beating air. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The puppet group has turned south Korea into a veritable hell through dictatorship and arbitrary practices. They are the top class fascist maniacs and ferocious human rights abusers who should be brought to a court of human conscience before anyone else.
					
					 The forcible dissolution of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) touching off denunciation among people of different social standings in south Korea clearly proves what alarming phase the conservative group's arbitrary practices and crackdown have reached.
					
					 The tentacles of brutal crackdown are stretched out not only to the UPP but to such legitimate trade unions as the Teachers Union and progressive media including Jaju Minbo.
					
					 Due to the political gangsters who learned nothing but high-handed and arbitrary practices and fascist dictatorship, south Korea has turned into the worst political underdeveloped area where not a trace of justice and democracy is found and a scene of rampage where horrible dictatorship prevails. 
					
					  It is nonsensical to talk about the dignity and right of the human beings in the graveyard of democracy.
					
					 South Korea under the reign of the group of traitors' dictatorship and misrule is the worst dictatorial society in the world where democracy is suffocated and tundra of human rights where the dignity and life of human beings are withering out under the pressure of avarice.
					
					  The puppet group of traitors is becoming evermore desperate in its racket to isolate and stifle the DPRK while talking about its "human rights". This is an unpardonable mockery and challenge to human conscience.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Authorities for Forcibly Dissolving UPP
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Authorities for Forcibly Dissolving UPP
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The present south Korean puppet authorities had persecuted and suppressed the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) on false charges of attempted rebellion after labeling it a "party following the north." They prodded what they called the "constitutional court" into deciding on its dissolution in just 30 minutes on Dec. 19. It, at the same time, deprived five lawmakers from the party of their membership of the "National Assembly."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The forcible disbanding of the UPP is a product of the present ruling forces' plot to justify their policy of confrontation with compatriots in the north and establish the fascist dictatorial system.
					
					 There is neither ground nor pretext to forcibly dissolve the UPP as its programme and activities are in line with the aspiration of the south Korean people and the trend of the times. 
					
					 What matters is the fact that the south Korean puppet authorities are justifying the forcible dissolution of the UPP by linking it to the DPRK in a bid to totally stamp out the progressive democratic forces in south Korea, tide over its worst political crisis and further intensify its fascist dictatorial rule with the case as a momentum. 
					
					Herein lies the gravity of the situation.
					
					 The case reminds one of the spyring case cooked up by the "yusin" dictator in an effort to enforce his fascist repressive rule.
					
					 No one can vouch that this fascist dictatorship will not be enforced against other progressive parties.
					
					 History and the nation will brand those involved in hideous politically-motivated terrorism as the worst fascist gangsters and surely deal crushing sledge-hammer blows at them.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its Anachronistic Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its Anachronistic Policy toward DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Total failure of the present U.S. administration's "strategic patience policy" has become obvious, sparking off an uproar in the U.S.
					 The U.S. Congress had termed the policy a "fence sitting policy" in August. Its research service published a report critical of the policy on Dec. 11.
					
					 The report noted that the Obama administration's policy toward the DPRK featured as "strategic patience policy" has made the DPRK steadily bolster up its nukes and missile capability.
					
					 Even those in the U.S. political camp are becoming increasingly critical of it, terming it a "completely failed policy" as it compelled the "north to consolidate its social system and have access to nukes."
					
					 Unabated in the camp is the scramble among political forces due to the Obama administration's anachronistic policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 This, in the final analysis, means a total bankruptcy of the U.S. harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK and strikingly proves that the latter's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts has proved successful. 
					
					 Since it took office, the present U.S. administration has pursued what it called the strategic patience policy which calls for waiting until the DPRK gives up all its nuclear activities and dismantles its nukes and yields to the U.S.
					
					 It has noisily trumpeted about the theory of "disallowing the north's nukes" the keynote of which is that it can neither recognize nor overlook the latter's access to nukes and the latter should unconditionally dismantle or abandon its nukes.
					
					 While talking about the non-existent "provocation" and "threat" and "human rights" issue of the DPRK, the U.S. has persistently worked to bring down its social system by ratcheting up international "sanctions" and "cooperation" against it.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence which Washington has so vociferously claimed to be a "threat" to it and its allies is a product of its persistent nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has termed the DPRK a criminal country in the international arena, spearheaded unreasonable international sanctions and pressure upon it and posed nuclear threat and blackmail to it by bringing huge nuclear strike means to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Under this situation the DPRK's nukes are, indeed, a deterrent for self-defence that it should keep and further bolster up until Washington's nuclear threat and blackmail are defused, and a treasured sword of justice for breaking the cursed nuclear stick of the U.S. and establishing a fair world order.
					
					 The DPRK has nothing to fear in the world as it emerged a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The world admires the DPRK making a great leap forward, racing against the time full of dynamism and foresees the miserable end of the U.S.
					
					 Washington's "strategic patience policy-waiting policy" turned out to be a "failed strategy" and "irresponsible policy", precipitating the decline and ruin of the U.S.
					
					 The sorry looks of the U.S. today reminds one of the erstwhile Roman Empire which was thrown into a dumping ground of history as it collapsed while seeking prosperity through aggression and war.
					
					 The U.S., with a gloomy future, is now running helter-skelter due to its foreign policy failures in various parts of the world. A fierce scramble among its political forces is unabated and it is being censured by the world as tundra of human rights, as evidenced by white policemen's shooting of black men to death, and it is flooded with a huge army of jobless people due to a serious economic crisis.
					
					 The Obama administration's anti-DPRK scenario aimed at bringing the latter to its knees through the "strategic patience policy" is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to think twice with a cool head over its counterproductive harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Evading Responsibility
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Evading Responsibility
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean MBC blamed the puppet ruling forces for being keen on evading responsibility.
					 It recalled that the prosecution's investigation into the document on the tendency of Jong Yun Hoe was concluded that it had "no substantial evidence."
					
					 This led to the temporary recess of the "National Assembly" due to the conflicting views of the ruling party which claims that the case was clinched through the prosecution's investigation and of the opposition parties which hold that "they cannot trust the investigation," it noted.
					
					 Noting that the ruling party has never opted for owning responsibility for issues, MBC chided it for making haste to protect Chongwadae.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Repressive Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Repressive Campaign 
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Regime cannot tide over its ruling crisis through wholesale suppression under pretence of security" was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Monday.
					 The editorial recalled that the chief prosecutor threatened to counter any collective actions, including meetings and demos that are opposed to the decision of the "constitutional court" on disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP).
					
					 No sooner had conservative organizations filed a complaint with the prosecution against the members of the UPP on charges of the violation of "Security Law" than the prosecution started investigation into the party, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 People are becoming increasingly vocal expressing concern over the kick-off of wholesale "witch hunt." The forcible dissolution of the UPP proves that the regime feels very fretful.
					
					 Blackmailing can gag people for the time being but an unjust regime is bound to face a stern judgment of the people and meet a miserable end. This is a lesson taught by history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Korean Artistes in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Korean Artistes in Japan
						
 Tokyo, December 22 (KNS-KCNA) -- Members of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 18 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 It was attended by Han Tong Song, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kim Sang Il, member of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, and members of the opera troupe.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers recollected with deep emotion the loving care shown by him for the troupe.
					
					 The proud course of development covered by the troupe along with Chongryon would be unthinkable apart from his wise leadership and warm care, they noted.
					
					 They praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for carrying forward the loving care of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They underlined the need for all members of the troupe to be well aware of their mission as those of a Juche-based overseas compatriots' art organization and make redoubled efforts to arouse patriotism and preserve national identity among the compatriots and develop national culture and arts.
					
					 Such numbers as "Song of Comradeship" were put on the stage at the meeting.

articles.title: Russian Figures Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Russian Figures Visit DPRK Missions 
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Many Russian personages of different social strata visited the DPRK embassy in Moscow and the branch of the DPRK consulate general in Khabarovsk on Dec. 16 and 17 to commemorate the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the full-length picture of them and paid tribute to them. The visitors included the first vice-chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, the minister of Development of Far East, the vice-president of the Supreme Court, the director of its International Cooperation Department, the deputy director of the General Department of the International Military Cooperation of the Ministry of Defense, the director of the Asia 1 Department of the Foreign Ministry, the special advisor to the director of the External Intelligence Bureau, the deputy director of the International Cooperation Department of the Ministry of Extraordinary Situation, the deputy director for Foreign Relations of the Federal Emigration Bureau, a  deputy director of the "Russian Railways" Company, deputies to the State Duma, the deputy director of the International Department of the Liberal De
					
					 mocratic Party of Russia, a secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the international secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party-Party of Communists of Russia, the first secretary of the C.C., the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the Moscow Workers' Union, the chief of the Korean Affairs Section of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Academy of Sciences, the chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the director of the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company, the deputy director of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N. S. Nadezhdina, secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the vice-mayor of Nizhuny Novgorod City.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, ministries, organizations, units and personages of different social standings sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in the relevant countries from Dec. 15 to 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The floral baskets were placed before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the full-length pictures of them. They were sent by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces and the Ministry of Trade and Foreign Investment of Cuba, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, Prensa Latina News Agency, the Centre of the Cuban Workers, the C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam, the Foreign Ministry, Ministry of Defence, Ministry of Public Security, Ministry of Industry and Commerce, Ministry of Transportation and the Academy of Social Sciences of Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh Museum, the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations, various parties of Indonesia, the Ministry of Youth and Sports Affairs, Jakarta City Office and Bungkarno University of Indonesia, the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the Foreign Ministry and the International Commerce Promotion Center of Myanmar, the Iranian 
					
					 Munitions Industry Organization, Iranian Workers' House, the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran, the People's Party, Funcinpec Party and Khmer Democratic Part of Cambodia, the Ministry of Culture and Arts, Ministry of the Interior and Ministry of Women Affairs of Cambodia, the Swiss Globetrotter Group, an Italian group, the Belgian branch of the Korean Friendship Association, the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front and the Foreign Ministry of Ethiopia, the general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the Iranian foreign minister, the prime minister of Yangon Regional Government of Myanmar, the secretary general of China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, the chairperson of Emperor Group of Hong Kong and the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Italy on Dec. 15.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks to be fulfilled to face-lift the land as befitting the appearance of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Main contents of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was carried by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on its bulletin on Dec. 9.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the idea that it is the principal requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to invariably hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily strengthen and develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on its website "Paektusan" on Dec. 16.
					A photo of smiling Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Political Parties and Organizations of Nordic Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Political Parties and Organizations of Nordic Countries
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Nordic countries held a joint meeting for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il in Stockholm, Sweden on Dec. 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were figures and members of the political parties, friendly and solidarity organizations with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Nordic countries including the Communist Party in Sweden, Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Finnish Communists' League, Finland-Korea Society, Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and the Friendship Society Norway-Korea.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided powerful nuclear deterrent and firmly defended the country's sovereignty and people's happiness and peace and security on the Korean Peninsula by enforcing great Songun politics.
					
					 He also made great contributions to the cause of the national reunification and wisely led the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, stressed that great are Kim Jong Il's exploits performed for the cause of Korea's reunification and the cause of global independence.
					
					 He said that it is their duty to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause. 
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, emphasized that Kim Jong Il's idea and cause are being steadfastly carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 And a declaration was read out there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Idea and Line Are Eternal Guidelines of WPK: Chilean Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Idea and Line Are Eternal Guidelines of WPK: Chilean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Eduardo Artes, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), issued a statement on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In the statement titled "Kim Jong Il is the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)" the first secretary said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il passed away but the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK. This is by no means symbolic.
					
					 The idea and line of Kim Jong Il serve as the eternal guidelines of the WPK.
					
					 The theory on Songun politics formulated by him, in particular, serves as an ever-victorious banner for defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and preserving the independence of the popular masses today when the imperialists' policy of strength is getting evermore undisguised.
					
					 The validity and vitality of Kim Jong Il's Songun line were clearly proved in the DPRK's reality.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its dignity and might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state in the world while smashing the extreme economic sanctions and blockade by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces. This is entirely ascribable to the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He laid the firm foundation for building an economic power.
					
					 His idea and cause will always remain in the hearts of the Korean people and the progressives struggling for global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Posted by KFA on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Posted by KFA on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain commemorated the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It posted on its website on Dec. 8 articles titled "Succession to the cause of Songun", "Eternal sun of Songun", "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)" , "Invincible WPK", etc. illustrated with photos documenting his Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The articles highly praised Kim Jong Il as the eternal general secretary of the WPK, sun of Songun and peerless patriot as he developed the WPK into the invincible revolutionary party, built the DPRK into the politico-ideological power and military power with his unique Songun politics and made immortal contributions to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the cause of global independence.
					
					 They said that Juche Korea will certainly win the final victory under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is energetically leading the building of a thriving socialist nation with the firm faith and will to translate into reality the noble intention and desire of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Romanian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania posted on its website an article titled "Eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK" on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who assumed the responsibility for the destiny of socialist Korea directed all to bolstering the military power and, on this basis, made big efforts to steadily boosting the overall national power of the country.
					
					 He made sure the DPRK demonstrated its dignity as a military power with invincible muscle.
					
					 He put the DPRK's self-supporting defense industry on the basis of the latest science and technology by directing primary efforts to its development.
					
					 He consolidated the civilian defence forces into the invincible ranks and turned the whole country into the impregnable fortress.
					
					 The DPRK had access to even the nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. reckless nuclear threats.
					
					 It put a definite end to the days when the U.S. threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with A-bomb and provided a firm guarantee for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il consolidated the country's politico-ideological base as firm as rock and ushered in the new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 His exploits will shine forever along with the prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Czech Party Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Czech Party Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted by the Czechoslovak Communist Party on its website on Dec. 16.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), deals with the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are the powerful political mode of the present times which inherited and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and the scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the times and revolution.
					
					A portriat of smiling Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Milan Center for Study of Juche Idea Formed in Italy
articles.content:
Milan Center for Study of Juche Idea Formed in Italy 
						
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Milan, Italy Center for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed on Dec. 14 with due ceremony. 
					 The representative of the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association was elected chief of the center. 
					
					 The inaugural ceremony discussed the issue of actively studying and disseminating the works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Brazilian Organization Denounces U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Offensive
articles.content:
Brazilian Organization Denounces U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Offensive 
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Centre for Peace and Solidarity with Peoples made public a statement on Dec. 15 in denunciation of the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive. 
					 Castigating the UN "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK, the statement went on: 
					
					 The railroading of the "resolution on human rights" through the UN was a political fraud made by the U.S. for the purpose of intensifying the smear campaign against the DPRK by setting in motion some EU countries and Japan. 
					
					 That was why many independent countries opposed the "resolution". 
					
					 The "resolution" is peppered with false stories. This is a grave insult to the DPRK. 
					
					 The "resolution" does not reflect at all the fact that the U.S. has barred the DPRK from having economic exchange with foreign countries and blockaded it militarily and economically for over six decades. 
					
					 Owing to the U.S. blockade the DPRK has suffered difficulties in production, consumption and overall social life. 
					
					 The U.S. is tightening the blockade against those countries that do not follow it, spreading the lie that the people are maltreated in the countries. 
					
					 The  U.S. and its followers have no moral qualifications to talk about human rights of other countries. 
					
					 Their criminal acts in Middle East, Africa and Asia clearly show their hypocritical nature. 
					
					 Their purpose is to paint the DPRK as the one like those countries where humanitarianism disappeared under the pretext of "humanitarian interference". 
					
					 We sincerely hope that the DPRK would make steady social progress and development for its people.
					
					  We again extend our firm support to the Korean people in their just cause for defending the right to self-determination and sovereignty and achieving the country's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign media praised the feats of peerlessly great men on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Prensa Latina said on Dec. 2:
					
					 The Korean people are paying highest tribute to him on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 This is a manifestation of the noble sense of moral obligation towards the peerlessly great man who developed in depth the Juche idea, Songun idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence, turned the DPRK into an impregnable socialist fortress, brought changes of the century for prosperity and made distinguished contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blitz on Dec. 8 said that Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats for the cause of socialism.
					
					 The feats performed by the great man for socialist cause are successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Hungarian paper Liberation on Dec. 12 noted that Kim Jong Il's life is always shedding its rays in the DPRK:
					
					 He developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary ranks under the banner of Songun, laid a solid foundation for self-supporting defence industry and provided powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 He also registered special achievements in the work for achieving the national historic cause of reunification and in the field of external relations.
					
					 The Equatorial Guinea TV broadcasting service on Dec. 3 reported that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the socialist land of bliss where people's desire came into full bloom, and into the satellite manufacturer and launcher.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang.
					Tras ver el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal se entero en detalles del estado de materializacion de legado del Dirigente dado a la fabrica.
					
					La fabrica deviene un patrimonio patriotico dejado por el Dirigente quien escogio en persona un solar bueno para su construccion y la bautizo como "Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang" cuando la obra quedo completada, dijo el Mariscal. 
					
					Prosiguio que al visitarla en septiembre de 2009 el Dirigente recorrio durante largo tiempo varios procesos de produccion y dio valiosas instrucciones que se presentan para desarrollar a nuestro estilo la tecnica de piscicultura senalando que la fabrica es una de las importantes bases de servicio de abastecimiento a los ciudadanos.
					
					Nuestro pais cuenta con la firme base de piscicultura preparada gracias a la abnegada direccion de los grandes lideres, senalo e ordeno aceptar con corazon la orientacion del partido de desarrollar la piscicultura e impulsarla con tenacidad para que las bases de piscicultura preparadas al cabo de tantos esfuerzos surtan efectos.
					
					La Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang debe avivar el fervor de la revolucion de la piscicultura para que reine en todo el pais un ambiente de piscicultura, subrayo y apunto que solo de esta manera, la fabrica puede convertirse en un plantel amado por el pueblo de acuerdo con el proposito del Dirigente.
					
					Instruyo la necesidad de levantar en el recinto de la fabrica el mural de mosaico que describe la imagen del Dirigente para transmitir eternamente las inmortales hazanas de el quien abrio en este territorio una nueva historia de piscicultura de siluros.
					
					Dando vueltas por la sala de orden general, el edifico de incubacion y los criaderos bajo techo y al aire libre, el Mariscal averiguo el estado de produccion y presento las tareas asumidas ante la fabrica.
					
					Aclaro uno por uno los temas que se presentan en la produccion y la gestion como el de  movilizar la fuerza espiritual de los empleados y el de preparar las buenas condiciones de vida, el de completar perfectamente el sistema de produccion integral, el de formar con firmeza  las fuerzas cientifico-tecnicas e intensificar los estudios tecnicos entre los empleados, el de compartir entre varias unidades las buenas experiencias logradas en la piscicultura y elevar el papel de la rama de investigacion  cientifica.
					
					El partido mantiene la decision de convertir la fabrica en un modelo estandarizado de la rama de piscicultura del pais, asevero y agrego que le enviara las potentes fuerzas de diseno y obra necesarias a la modernizacion de ella.
					
					Es muy grande la esperanza del partido en la fabrica, dijo y manifesto su conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de ella tomen la delantera del pais en la cria de siluros.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, An Jong Su, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: AJDC condena a la banda surcoreana por su decision de disolver el PPU
articles.content:
AJDC condena a la banda surcoreana por su decision de disolver el PPU
						
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Las autoridades titeres surcoreanas cometieron hace poco el acto fascista de disolver por la fuerza el legitimo Partido Progresista Unido (PPU) del Sur de Corea y descalificar a los diputados a la "Asamblea Nacional" por el mismo partido.
					En su declaracion publicada ayer, el vocero de la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea recuerda que aquellas desintegraron el PPU tildandolo de "agrupacion inconstitucional y seguidora al Norte de Corea" y relacionando absurdamente su programa con la RPDC.
					
					Esto es una violacion flagrante de la democracia y los DDHH y el terrorismo politico sin precedentes, apunta la nota y prosigue:
					
					Calificamos esa decision de la banda de Park Geun-hye de ilegal acto fascista que desprecia totalmente hasta las elementales demandas juridicas y de barbaridad medieval que violo la libertad de expresion y asociacion y convirtio el suelo surcoreano en un infierno politico.
					
					La disolucion forzada del PPU se llevo a cabo justamente en el siglo XXI que no es igual al siglo pasado cuando recorrian las olas de McCarthyism anticomunista y el fascismo. Ese crimen de lesa humanidad contraviene a la corriente de la epoca y a los derechos humanos universales de la humanidad.
					
					Es el climax de cinismo que esos tiranos, que violan flagrantemente la elemental libertad politica del ser humano y sus derechos democraticos, cuestionaran tanto el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de alguien.
					
					Para colmo, la actual gobernante surcoreana aplaude ese acto fascista como una "decision historica", lo cual deja conocer que su mano esta detras del presente caso y ella resucita en el territorio surcoreano el fantasma de la dictadura de "Yusin".
					
					Con la disolucion del PPU, la banda conservadora surcoreana persigue su malsano objetivo de descomponer las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas, reprimir la lucha de los partidos opositores e impedir su retoma del poder levantando la oleada contra las supuestas "fuerzas seguidoras al Norte". Tambien trata de salir de la crisis de gobernacion al calmar la opinion critica interna y externa dirigida a ellos mismos debido al caso de intervencion de Jong Yun Hoe en las gestiones estatales.
					
					Esta claro que si se dejan intactos a esos fascistas enloquecidos por mantenerse largo tiempo en el poder y enfrentarse con la connacional RPDC, el suelo surcoreano se convertira en la tierra privada de derechos humanos y democracia y seran victimas del fascismo todos los partidos y entidades que le caen mal a la banda traidora.
					
					La leccion de historia ensena que los que tratan de mantener su vida con la gobernacion fascista, seran arruinados tragicamente.

articles.title: PSDC denuncia disolucion forzada de PPU del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
PSDC denuncia disolucion forzada de PPU del Sur de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea (PSDC) hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion denunciando la disolucion forzada del Partido Progresista Unido del Sur de Corea por parte de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					La nota lo califica de terror politico para exterminar la democracia y los derechos humanos, de crimen estrangular contra las fuerzas democraticas progresistas y reformistas surcoreanas que luchan  por la nueva politica, nueva vida y la reunificacion independiente del pais, y de otra provocacion politica a la parte connacional y continua:
					
					Lo mas problematico es que los conservadores surcoreanos actuan con astucia para evitar las fuertes protestas y denuncias vinculando tercamente el programa y las actividades del PPU con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Siempre que se encontraban en la crisis de dominacion, los gobernantes conservadores surcoreanos crearon el ambiente panico en la sociedad reprimiendo y asesinando a los partidos politicos y personalidades patrioticas que luchaban por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion tildandoles de "espias del Norte".  
					
					La mandataria surcoreana, descendiente del dictador de "Yusin", repite ese metodo rutinario y supera a los dictadores anteriores en su barbaridad, crueldad y vileza. 
					
					Es obvio que la locura fascista de la dictadura de "Yusin" va a reprimir a otros partidos politicos y entidades acusandolos de "fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					
					Al dejar intacta la horda fascista de los gobernantes surcoreanos en actual mandato, no habra la independencia, la democracia, la libertad, los derechos humanos, la paz y la reunificacion sino se acarrearan el enfrentamiento y los desastres de la guerra. 
					
					El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea no tolerara nunca con los partidos politicos progresistas del mundo amantes de la justicia y la verdad el terror fascista de la banda de Park Geun-hye que disperso forzosamente el PPU, legitimo partido politico, y castigara severamente a la banda conservadora que pretende mantener su sucia vida politica con la dictadura de "Yusin" nadando a contrapelo de la epoca y la opinion publica.

articles.title: Rusia dona alimentos a RPDC
articles.content:
Rusia dona alimentos a RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Termino la entrega de 50 mil toneladas de alimentos que el gobierno de la Federacion Rusa dona gratuitamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 23 la ceremonia de donacion en el Puerto de Nampho.
					
					La presente donacion de alimentos del gobierno ruso contribuira a desarrollar aun mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
